title: Email Settings
alt: What are all these less-than signs? What's an HREF? Look, we know you live in a fancy futuristic tech world, but not all of us have upgraded to the latest from Sun Microsystems.
transcript:
Email Settings
[A list of controls with radio buttons and checkboxes]
Default reply behavior
( ) Reply
( ) Reply All
(*) Forward to address bookVacation autoresponder
(*) While on vacation
( ) Always[x] Reply to all newsletters with "Thank you for the newsletter!"Attachment limit
( ) 300 KB
(*) 1.4 MB
( ) 5 MB (Beta)Default email format
(*) Plain text
( ) HTML
( ) CSS[x] Reply to HTML emails with "Whoa, buddy, what's all this code?"Character set
( ) ASCII (Unicode 0-127 only)
(*) Non-ASCII (Unicode 128+ only)Smart autocomplete
( ) Do not suggest replies
( ) Suggest replies
(*) Automatically respond to all emails with suggested replyImportant emails
(*) Show
( ) HideShow unread email count...
(*) Now
( ) On my projected day of deathSignature
(*) "That's my email. Hope you liked it!"
( ) None
